title: The Investor’s Guide To Mother’s Day
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: If you’re a successful investor, it’s less because of the great stocks you bought than from the patience you learned from your mother. Knowing that our mothers want our success as much as we want it for ourselves can fortify investors with persistence. And it is fit that we acknowledge that our mothers endowed us with an investment whose returns flow in perpetuity.This brief podcast concludes with a suggestion for a meaningful Mother’s Day gift. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
